title: half a year or so, Omega Squad Teemo's auto attack still bugged.
body: damage doesn't register until about .3 seconds after the missile makes contact. tested with normal teemo, and there was no delay

replies.body:
Hey Treasure Goblin,

Looks like this issue was resolved in 5.8. We'll take a look and see if the issue reoccurred.
I sadly i found it does this to all his other skins as well & I want this fix. it makes me lose Creepkills & champ kills! Please fix this riot. D:
